law.catch_line: An individual is eligible to participate in the tax sheltered annuity plan if the individual:...
law.text:
An individual is eligible to participate in the tax sheltered annuity plan if the individual:
is eligible for coverage under § 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code; and
is an officer or employee of:
this State; or
any other governmental entity in this State, including a county board of education.
